title: Chantilly Pink Super Soft Premium Cotton Lounge Pants
story_description:
Story Indulge in ultimate comfort and style with these solid pink Lounge Pants, the perfect
addition to your loungewear collection. These lounge pants boast a classic and sophisticated design,
featuring a solid pink pattern, creating a sense of balance and elegance. It features a drawstring
closure for utmost comfort and two side pockets and one back pocket to carry all your essential
items. Crafted using a slight sheen fabric blended with pure cotton, these lounge pants are soft and
gentle against the skin, providing a luxurious feel that is unmatched. So what are you waiting for?
slip into these lounge pants, relax, and enjoy the ultimate in comfort and style.
sub_category: Men’s Pajamas / Lounge Pants / Track Pants

title: White Linen Lounge Pant
story_description:
Story Comfort is key at bedtime. Add some snappy style to your sleep-ready look. These luxuriously
soft pyjama pants are crafted from an ultra-soft Premium Linen and Cotton Blend while moisture
wicking keeps you cool and dry. Reach for these pants from French Crown when you're Ready to wind
down.

title: Bright White with Alizarin Crimson Red Premium Cotton Lounge Pants
story_description:
Story Fabric: 100% Mercerized Combed Cotton. Double reinforced front, back and side seams. Durable
broad waistband with Concealed Strings. Thoughtful Construction. Two Pockets. One with Zipper.
Concealed button placket with a front opening. Ideal for loungewear and leisure wear. Half elastic,
No Crumbling in Front.

title: Casal Green Premium Cotton Lounge Pants
story_description:
Story Mediumweight, easy to slip on, and practical, these lounge pants from French Crown make a
reliable addition to your bottom wear collection. The soft and breathable cotton build allows you to
stay at ease for long hours. With drawstring closure, they can be worn comfortably and have two side
pockets and one back pocket. Style it with your graphic t-shirt and flip-flops.

stay at ease for long hours. With drawstring closure, they can be worn comfortably and have two side
pockets and one back pocket. Style it with your graphic t-shirt and flip-flops.
